duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in a physician's office setting under the direct responsibility of a licensed physician.
Perform clinical skills within the scope of a medical assistant as defined by relevant statutes and policies.
Perform clerical, insurance, and medical record functions as required.
May be required to float to other practices as needed for staffing.
Maintain certification or registration as a medical assistant, and possess Basic Life Support (CPR) certification.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited course of study as a certified or registered medical assistant.
Certification or registration as a medical assistant.
